Dear Teams,

New surveillance data has been uploaded to InfluCast, and submissions are now open for the latest forecasting round.

Please find the relevant links below:
•  Latest ARI data: https://github.com/Predizioni-Epidemiologiche-Italia/Influcast/tree/main/sorveglianza/ARI/2025-2026/latest
•  Latest ARI+ data: https://github.com/Predizioni-Epidemiologiche-Italia/Influcast/tree/main/sorveglianza/ARI%2B_FLU/2025-2026/latest

To view the specific weeks included in this round, please refer to the following file:
https://github.com/Predizioni-Epidemiologiche-Italia/Influcast/blob/main/supporting-files/forecasting_weeks.csv

If you would like to unsubscribe from this type of communication, please email us at influcast@isi.it
Thank you for your contributions.

Best regards,

The InfluCast Coordination Team
